## Problem 9.18

```{r}
head(cloud)
```

```{r}
cloud$A <- as.factor(cloud$A)
```



```{r}
plot(cloud)
```

```{r}
ggplot(cloud, aes(A)) +
  geom_bar()
```



```{r}
ggplot(cloud, aes(D, Rain)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```

```{r}
ms.1 <- lm(Rain ~ D, data = cloud)
summary(ms.1)
```

```{r}
plot(ms.1)
```


```{r}
residualPlots(ms.1)
```
